# Class TextEmbedderFactory

Factory class for creating TextEmbedder instances. Provides methods to create local or remote text embedders.

##### Index

### Methods

createLocal createRemote

## Methods

### `Static`createLocal

  * createLocal(config: [LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface)): Promise<[TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)>

Creates a local text embedder using the specified configuration.

#### Parameters

    * config: [LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface)

Configuration for local text embedder

#### Returns Promise<[TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)>

Promise resolving to a new TextEmbedder instance

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails




### `Static`createRemote

  * createRemote(config: [RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface)): Promise<[TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)>

Creates a remote text embedder using the specified configuration.

#### Parameters

    * config: [RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface)

Configuration for remote text embedder

#### Returns Promise<[TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)>

Promise resolving to a new TextEmbedder instance

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails
